name: CoG: Sci-Fi TDM
description:
This is the first game mode of a much larger project.  This is a Polygon based Sci-Fi Team deathmatch game.  It does require steam running in the background for multiplayer to function correctly, and singleplayer is not set for the time but will have some shooting enemy AI coming down the road.

This game is being created with Content created BY ME, and assets created by Synty Studios and John Galt
